alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 12 at 3:50AM MDT until May 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, mainly above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Snowy Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Mountain travel may be be hazardous due to slick roads and reduced visibilities in falling snow. Outdoor recreation could become dangerous to those caught unprepared for hazardous winter conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
